The base class that handles all direct Bluesky-related functionality of the ATProtoKit
API library.

Gets detailed profiles of several users.
Retrieves the results of a search query.
Gets all of the accounts the user account follows.

Retrieves information about several feed generators.
Lists a collection’s records within a respository.
Creates several invite codes.
Identifies the record based on the specific information provided.
Grabs and validates a post record to attach to a record’s embed at a later request.
Validates a PLC operation.
Sends interactions to a feed generator.
